sentence_1.text: Heavy flooding caused major road closures in southeast Houston.

sentence_2.text: Strong winds uprooted several trees and caused widespread power outages.

sentence_3.text: Residents reported significant building damage after prolonged rainfall.

sentence_4.text: Evacuations were ordered as water levels rose rapidly along the bayou.

sentence_5.text: Electricity cut and debris impacts were widespread following the intense storm.

sentence_6.text: Flights were cancelled at the Bush airport due to runway flooding.

sentence_7.text: Shipping operations along the channel were temporarily halted due to high water levels.

sentence_8.text: Residents reported snakes and alligators moving into yards after the bayou overflowed.

sentence_9.text: Multiple neighborhoods reported sewage backups and hygiene issues.

sentence_10.text: Industrial facilities in the energy corridor experienced temporary shutdowns during the storm.

sentence_11.text: Several people were treated for injuries after slipping in floodwater-covered streets.

sentence_12.text: Several people reported trauma and PTSD during the extended flooding event.

sentence_13.text: Business owners in the downtown district reported major economic losses due to store closures.

sentence_14.text: Transit services were suspended across several routes because of flooded intersections.
